column4: I did sudo passwd and now the lil GUI that asks for root permissions when running things like symantic is broken, how can i fix it?
Doesn't seem they actually do support here
everyone here is just users like you. there are no official ubuntu reps here
Yes I know this, what is your point/
i thought you were complaining about you not getting any help or something
I was, this is a support channel
ever thought that no one knows an answer to your problem. and remember, google is your buddie
Go away, it is a simple question and I did google, don't assume things.

if you'd actuall explain your question instead of "I did sudo passwd and now the lil GUI that asks for root permissions when running things like symantic is broken, how can i fix it?' you might get better help
Just because you don't understand things doesn't mean it wasn't explained well. Now STFU I don't want help from you, you don't know what you are talking about.
you probably enabled the root account didn't you?
Obviously, thats what sudo passwd does, god.
yeah, and if you googled like you said you'd see that that can break things.
I obviously already know it can break things, thats why i am here. Do you have a disability or something?
try disabling the root account, not that hard. usually when you mess something up the simple thing to do is to reverse it
i think you do, i just told you 3 times what to do
Thats what I am here to find out how to do, as I have already stated 6 times now, just don't talk please.
